works.description:
An inflammatory site aimed at poisoning  

SEO results for our company is located at the first url.  After learning  

that our organization was going to be featured on Restaurant impossible,  

the administrator created a site with bad reviews as an attempt to make us
 
look bad when we refused to pay a random fee of several hundred dollars.  

The second URL is the original site that they did for us. 
IVRestaurant.com  
used to point to the US-domestic site.  But since the "holding hostage" of
 
our domain -- they redirected it.  We are going to be featured on
Wednesday  
and would like to have this false content taken down.
